name: This Makes No Sense 2
description:
This Makes No Sense 2 is a little Project I am making with a friend. The first Game (This Makes No Sense) probably won't be released. Since I lost the data to edit This Makes No Sense, I decided starting the sequel with different and self-made music and more/advanced gameplay and sprites than the first game.

This game is still in Progress and is also one of my first games ever. Feedback always appreciated. When you don't like it, tell me what to change/improve.

:)
